attributes.action: Make drivers of Mobility scooters take a 12 monthly test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People with mobility scooters should have to take a test, they use them as battering rams, are all over the pavement and generally don't watch where they are going.
they should also have to have insurance.
only people registered disabled should be allowed to drive them
